user_question: What are the major geographical features of Madagascar and generate an image of the Avenue of the Baobabs?
final_answer: Madagascar's major geographical features include the central highlands, eastern rainforests, western dry deciduous forests, and the unique Avenue of the Baobabs. Image of the Avenue of the Baobabs generated. Madagascar is home to unique wildlife such as lemurs, the fossa, and over 300 species of frogs, many of which are endemic.
